Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2010 08:06AM chriztene wrote: hi everyone...just joined...i am crying just reading the few posts thus far...first time i have joined any kind of support group..diagnosed 5 months ago, lumpectomy and radiation..radiation completed a week ago!! Now, i find myself trying to understand what i just went thru...its sooo good to read posts of other women who have been thru this nightmare...i feel its hard to relate to those whom havent experienced bc...i still take xanax...couldnt eat or sleep!! chris
